wordpressPage.title: Describing Myself
wordpressPage.content:
Hello. This is me. Nabhoneel Majumdar.

What comes into my mind when I think about who I am?

Computer science, good designs, a mild obsession with technology, the internet, photographs, stories (reading and dreaming), music, thirst for travelling (which never gets quenched), landscapes, and trains of thoughts.

That’s the gist.

I firmly believe it is my family and my friends who have molded me in every way (99%), and 1% courtesy goes to the rest of the world around me.

I always keep telling myself, whenever I fall into a relatively tougher situation,

Adapt to survive.

However, I also believe that sometimes, not adapting to a situation makes life meaningful.

On a formal note, I’m an undergraduate student of Ramakrishna Mission Residential College, Narendrapur, studying computer science along with electronics and mathematics. I used to study in Salt Lake School, CA block.

The above photograph is relatively old but this is one of the best photographs we possess.
